mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysAdmin Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ ADMIN_ID , PW , ADMIN_TP_CD , ADMIN_STAT_CD , APRV_DT , REJECT_DT , LAYOFF_DT , DRMC_DT , SECSN_DT , ADMIN_NM , ADMIN_EMP_NO , DEPT_NM , COM_ID , SHOP_ID , EMAIL , PG_INTRLCK_EXPSR_YN , CC_CNTR_SECT_CD , CC_TEAM_SECT_CD , MOBIL_NATION_NO , MOBIL_AREA_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_NO , MOBIL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , TEL_NATION_NO , TEL_AREA_NO , TEL_TLOF_NO , TEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , FAX_NATION_NO , FAX_AREA_NO , FAX_TLOF_NO , FAX_TLOF_WTHN_NO , LAST_LOGIN_DT , LOGIN_FAILR_COUNT , PW_INTZ_YN , PW_INTZ_DT , LOGIN_PSB_IP_CHK_YN , LOGIN_PSB_IP , SESION_ID , CTI_ID , CTI_PW , CTI_EXNO , CTI_RECRD_ID , CTI_GRP_ID , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_ADMIN WHERE 1 = 1 AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysAdmin Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_ADMIN WHERE 1 = 1 AND ADMIN_ID = #{adminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
